subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: LeBron James had 37 points and Antawn Jamison added 24 as the Cavaliers took a 3-1 lead in their first-round series against the Bulls.
snippet: LeBron James had 37 points and Antawn Jamison added 24 as the Cavaliers took a 3-1 lead in their first-round series against the Bulls.
